explanation: [0-0] A man dressed in Western cowboy attire stands in an open area. He wears a black cowboy hat adorned with metal studs and a pair of yellow sunglasses. He is dressed in a brown fringed jacket over a red shirt, with black jeans and a belt, which has a holster attached. In his right hand, he holds a revolver, with the barrel pointing to the right.

[0-6] The man fires a shot, and white smoke emerges from the gun barrel. He maintains his shooting stance, raises his left hand, and the scene switches to a close-up of him holding the gun. He grips the gun with his right hand and points at the hammer with his left index finger. The man speaks happily, gesturing with his left hand, and prepares to holster the gun at his waist.
